author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
After a bunch of switches between different dependencies, going from being called PulseEffects to EasyEffects now it's making another big shift moving from GTK and Libadwaita over to Qt and Kirigami from KDE

title: EasyEffects Leaves GTK For a Qt Future
